entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
